text: Central Ontario is part of Southern Ontario in the Canadian province of Ontario. It is between Georgian Bay and the eastern end of Lake Ontario. Its area is . The population was 1,070,644 in 2011. It is mostly rural. The southern part is more densely populated than the northern part. Some of the largest cities include Peterborough, Barrie, and Belleville. == Counties == There are five counties in Central Ontario: * Dufferin County * Haliburton County * Hastings County * Northumberland County * Peterborough County * Simcoe County * Prince Edward County is a single-tier municipality. Ten towns, villages and townships merged with the county. The county government provides all services. == References == Category:Regions of Ontario
title: Central Ontario
